meanings.definition: Material used to cover and decorate the walls of a room.
meanings.sent1: The wallpaper in the living room has a floral pattern.
meanings.sent2: I picked out a new wallpaper for my bedroom walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the wallpaper and got stuck.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like peeling away layers of old wallpaper, revealing a brighter room beneath.
meanings.sent5: The wallpaper with its vibrant colors transformed the dull room into a cozy space.

meanings.sent1: I changed my wallpaper to a beautiful sunset scene.
meanings.sent2: The default wallpaper on my computer is a serene landscape.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see my cat trying to catch the cursor on the wallpaper.
meanings.sent4: The wallpaper on my screen made it feel like I was gazing out of a window.
meanings.sent5: The wallpaper of a starry night sky made me feel calm and peaceful.

meanings.sent1: I need to wallpaper the accent wall in the bedroom.
meanings.sent2: She decided to wallpaper the entire room in a bold print.
meanings.sent3: The kids thought it was funny to wallpaper their treehouse with comic strips.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to wallpaper over the cracks in their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The memories of that day wallpapered themselves in her mind, vivid and unchanging.
